oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MacArthur visit, after the ceremony
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken after the ceremony celebrating General Douglas MacArthur's 1951 visit to Middle Tennessee State College; his second wife Jean Faircloth MacArthur was a former resident of Murfreesboro and attended Soule College for Women
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: MacArthur, Douglas, 1880-1964; Generals; Middle Tennessee State College
Military leadership
